*Infectra looks at the sky thinking and than see's Arrow* Infectra: Oh.... =
*Infectra looks at the strange mixture and takes a little bit. She tastes i=
t and smiles giving a sign that she likes it*
  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000=
 4:48 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Arrow came back with some weird =
stuff. Stronghold groaned but then his stomach growled.

  "Okay, what is t=
hat?" Stronghold said. Blender laughed and grabbed some of the...whatever.
=

  "Well, I found some assorted stuff and mixed it together. Berry's, mushr=
ooms, some squirrels." Arroe said. Blender shrugged and kept eating it.

  =
"Ahhh, yeah, thanks." Stranato said.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 1=
6, 2000 5:12 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra sits down o=
n the ground* Infectra: I hope so too. *Infectra says back to Airbomber and=
 than sighs*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
     =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:03 AM
      Su=
bject: Neo Beast Wars


      Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Megatron's)=
 base and looks at it. It didn't notice her, so she went closer and inspect=
ed it. She looked around it, making notes of certain things.

      Plintis=
sa followed Artist out in the missle of no where in a desert. Artist turned=
 around and looked at Plintissa.

      "Plintissa now see Artist's secret =
treasure!" Artist said. He smiled. Plintissa was stunned. Artist dug a litt=
le in the sand, and brought up a hermit crab shell. Artist laughed and ran =
off laughing giddily. Plintissa sighed and turned back. No wait, maybe this=
 way was back. No wait, that way. Plintissa realized she was lost, and that=
 Artist was nowhere to be found. She looked around from left to right. Oh, =
what was the use, she might as well be dead out on the desert anyhow, she o=
bviously wasn't needed, not even Dracona stuck around with her! She had tho=
ught that Iron Raptor was her friend, but that blew up in her face. Then sh=
e made the mistake of trusting some bot sho said he would help her, and the=
n she went off and nobody trusted her any longer. Plintissa walked off into=
 the distance, hoping to find her way home. Then it occured to her. She did=
n't have a home. a single tear fell from Plintissa's eye and she walked on.=


      Artist ran off into the distance and looked back joyfully. Plintiss=
a wasn't there.

      "Yikes! I was supposed to protect her!" Artist said.=
 He ran back into the desert, darting quickly mile for mile, trying to find=
 Plintissa.

      Gangon's spark glowed eerily and bumped into BrightBlade=
's hand.

      Sinesis and Sinister lay there, half dead with Sinister in =
pieces.

      Deemos figures out that this disgusting team must not be rig=
ht for him and he runs off, hoping maybe the Maximals would be good enough =
to let him and his wife join and heal up. He ran along, going quickly, abou=
t 2 hours later he found the Maximal base. Inzola was in his arms in stasis=
 lock and spitting out blood, she was bleeding internally. Deemos whimpered=
 and aproached the Maximal base.

      "Attention! Maximals! I wish to joi=
n you, as does my wife and cohort, Inzola! Let me it, Inzola is in critical=
 condition!" Deemos said.

      The Radicons ceased their walk and sat dow=
n in a forest. Airbomber sighed.

      "Food would be good about now." Tra=
in Wreck said. Arrow smiled.

      "Wait here, I'll go get something!" Arr=
ow said. He went running off. Blender and Stronghold shrugged, Stronghold s=
taring into the distance and Blender scanning the area. Stranato and Train =
Wreck look at each other and gulp. Arrow must be their chef now.

      "I =
hope you like what Arrow makes." Airbomber said to Infectra. (If she's ther=
e.)
